name: Payment by Invoice, Twint, on Pickup for WooCommerce
author: Berg Informatik

sections.installation:
1. Download, unzip and upload to your WordPress plugins directory
  2. Activate the plugin within you WordPress Administration Backend

sections.description:
Adds additional payment gateways to WooCommerce: pay by invoice or pay on account, pay by twint and payment on pickup. The plugin offers various offline payment gateways, which require manual verification of incoming payments.

Key Features

  • Payment by invoice or on account
  • Payment by twint (manual payment without gateway)

  • Payment on pickup

  • Manage order status (pending, processing, on-hold etc.)

  • Option: Do only offer the payment gateway to registered/loggedin customers

  • Option: Do only offer the payment gateway to customers with specific user role
  • Option: Do only offer the payment gateway to customers who have at least completed one order
  • Option: Offer payment gateway only to your customers when the cart total is greater than a minimum value
  • Option: Offer payment gateway only to your customers when the cart total is smaller than a maximum value
  • Option: Offer payment gateway only to new customer when the cart total is greater than a minimum value
  • Option: Offer payment gateway only to new customer when the cart total is smaller than a maximum value

If you need a special integration or custom coding, please visit Woo Agentur or Support WP, Support WP

Thanks

This plugin based on the feature rich Germanized for WooCommerce Plugin. Special thanks to the authors vendidero and Dennis.

WooCommerce Germanized
